00043 #ifndef M3_UTIL
00044 #define M3_UTIL
00045 
00046 using namespace std;
00047  
00048 #include <assert.h>
00049 
00050 class m3_object;
00051 
00052 /* 
00053  * Defines macros to deal with unallocated memory objects
00054  * and other functions to deal with possible exceptions during the execution
00055  */
00056 
00057 #ifdef DEBUG 
00058 # define obj_destroy(N) destroy(N);
00059 #else 
00060 # define obj_destroy(N)
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #ifdef DEBUG
00064 # define obj_create(N) { create_new_object(N,((m3_object *) this)); }
00065 #else
00066 # define obj_create(N)
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #ifdef DEBUG
00070 # define obj_destroy_n(N,x) destroy_and_print_name(N,x);
00071 #else
00072 # define obj_destroy_n(N,x)
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 extern void destroy_and_print_name(int &, m3_object *); 
00076 extern void create_new_object(int &, m3_object *); 
00077 extern string obj_name(m3_object *);
00078 
00079 /* 
00080  * assertions and weak assertions
00081  */
00082 
00083 #define m3_assert(expr) assert(expr)
00084 #endif
